tweet: Get ready for smart contracts on #Cardano.  Join IOHK’s scientists and engineers to learn about Plutus, the programming platform for smart contracts on the Cardano blockchain and Marlowe, the simple smart contracts language for financiers:  https://t.co/sYr5J6h8Uv #PlutusFest  https://t.co/s1t5VDgJqy

IOHK have released the Cardano testnet! Here, developers and end users of Daedalus wallet can explore new features before they are deployed on the mainnet. Read the announcement here:  https://t.co/d3lcUlePbp

Thanks to our community member, Jordan, our Cardano meetup community has grown to Boulder, Colorado. Their first meetup was held this past weekend, which you can read about here:  https://t.co/jOYmtefVni And join their group here:  https://t.co/dqKiGMAXAV #CardanoCommunity

Make sure to RSVP to attend the inaugural #PlutusFest in Edinburgh, Scotland with IOHK. PlutusFest will be taking place at The University of Edinburgh on the 11th of December. Featuring @IOHK_Charles and other speakers:  https://t.co/41uuUKHSkW  #Cardano #blockchain  https://t.co/4LMXUn2DVN
